nextLengthDescription.message: Die Anzahl der Stücke, die der Spieler in der Warteschlange sehen kann

lockdownBarLabel.description: The bar at the bottom of the screen that indicates how much time is left on lock delay and how many move resets remain

lockdownBarDescription.message: Erlaube die Möglichkeit, zusätzliche Informationen über Sperrverzögerung und Grenzwerte zu sehen

swayScaleLabel.description: 'Matrix Sway' can also be called field movement, screen shake, etc; 'scale' is how much magnitude it has in general

swayScaleDescription.message: Wie weit sich die Matrix in Prozent auf die Kraft der Teile bewegt. Die Auswahl O deaktiviert den Effekt vollständig
swayScaleDescription.description: The 'matrix' is also known as the 'playfield'

swaySpeedLabel.description: 'Matrix Sway' can also be called field movement, screen shake, etc; 'speed' is how quickly the field move sback to its normal position after being pushed

swaySpeedDescription.message: Wie schnell die Matrix in Prozent an ihre neutrale Position zurückkehrt
swaySpeedDescription.description: The 'matrix' is also known as the 'playfield'

particleSettingsLabel.description: Label for a button to bring up particle options

particleLimitDescription.message: Wie viele Partikel gleichzeitig auf dem Bildschirm angezeigt werden können

particleSizeDescription.message: Wie groß die Partikel sein werden

actionTextLabel.description: Text that appears when you do certain actions, 'Single', 'T-Spin' as well as displaying a combo counter

actionTextDescription.message: Nachrichten anzeigen, wenn Sie Linien löschen und Tricks ausführen, wie z. B. 'Double' und 'T-Spin'. Zeigt auch den Kombenzähler an

skinLabel.description: 'Skin' as in the sprites used by the pieces

skinDescription.message: Wählen sie ein Skin anstatt des normalen aus

boneOption.description: Please look at the reference image as translation may be difficult. 'Brackets', as in these: [], may be a good option

gridLabel.description: The background grid used by the game

fullGridOption.description: Grid style that uses a full square (□)

dotGridOption.description: Grid style that uses a dot in the center of the cell

lockFlashLabel.description: Controls the style that the lock flash uses

shineLFOption.description: Lock flash style that causes a 2 frame white flash, followed by long dim with a shine line effect that goes from the bottom left to the top right

flashDimLFOption.description: Lock flash style that causes a 2 frame white flash, followed by long dim

flashLFOption.description: Lock flash style that causes a 2 frame white flash

colorOverrideLabel.description: Allows the user to override pieces colors with their own desired chices

redOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

orangeOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

yellowOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

greenOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

lightBlueOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

blueOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

purpleOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

whiteOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

blackOption.description: Please base your translation off the reference image

themeLabel.description: Changes the visual appearance that TL uses ingame

themeDescription.message: Determines the visual style of the game
